sentences.en: a reminder from the dentist for your check-up
sentences.cn: 牙医寄来的检查提醒函

sentences.en: Cabbage was always a depressing reminder of the leaner years of my childhood.
sentences.cn: 卷心菜往往使我沮丧地回忆起我孩提时代那些缺吃少穿的年头.

sentences.en: For most people a heart attack is a forceful reminder that they are mortal.
sentences.cn: 对多数人来说，心脏病发作会强烈地提醒他们终有一天自己会死去。

sentences.en: I have had another reminder from the library.
sentences.cn: 我又收到图书馆的催还单.

sentences.en: It always took a final reminder to get her to pay her share of the rent.
sentences.cn: 总是得发给她一份最后催缴通知,她才付应该交的房租.

sentences.en: She place it in the drawer as reminder of her resolve.
sentences.cn: 她将它放在抽屉里,以此来不断提醒自己下的决心.

sentences.en: She turned aside , while a tear welled up in each eye at this reminder.
sentences.cn: 她把头转向一旁.经这么一提,这时她的眼睛里涌出了泪花.

sentences.en: The allusion served as a timely reminder to Darnay.
sentences.cn: 这暗示即刻提醒了代尔那.

sentences.en: The British are about to be given a sharp reminder of what fighting abroad really means.
sentences.cn: 有些事将很快让英国人清楚意识到海外作战究竟意味着什么。

sentences.en: The last thing you'd want is a constant reminder of a bad experience.
sentences.cn: 你最不想要的就是不断让你想起一段糟糕经历的东西。

sentences.en: The letter was an uncomfortable reminder of my debts.
sentences.cn: 那封信是催促还债的通知,让我很不痛快.

sentences.en: The recent outbreaks of cholera are a timely reminder that this disease is still a serious health hazard.
sentences.cn: 最近霍乱的爆发及时提醒了人们该疾病仍然会严重危害健康。

sentences.en: The reminder window now has better alignment with text and icons.
sentences.cn: 对于自定义图标代码已经大为改善.

sentences.en: The sheer size of the cathedral is a constant reminder of the power of religion.
sentences.cn: 大教堂的宏大规模使人时刻领略到宗教的威严。

sentences.en: These findings are a reminder that low pay is the other side of the coin of falling unemployment.
sentences.cn: 这些研究结果提醒人们，失业率下降的另一面是低薪。

sentences.en: These paintings are in some ways a reminder that earthly pleasures are ephemeral.
sentences.cn: 这些画在某种意义上提醒人们世俗的享乐是短暂的。

sentences.en: These ruins are an eloquent reminder of the horrors of war.
sentences.cn: 这些废墟形象地提醒人们不要忘记战争的恐怖.

trans.tran_cn: 令人回忆起…的东西，提醒…的东西，（告知该做某事的）通知单，提示信
trans.tran_en: Something that serves as a reminder of another thing makes you think about the other thing
